subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} [[loud]]
# {{lb|zh|archaic}} [[loudly]]
#* '''[[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]]:''' Wang Bao (王褒), ''[[w:Fu (poetry)|Rhapsody]] for the [[w:Xiao (flute)|Flute]], [[w:Wen Xuan|Wen Xuan]]'' ([[:zh:s:昭明文選/卷17#洞簫賦|文選/洞簫賦]])
#*: [[哮呷]]'''呟'''[[喚]]，[[躋躓]][[連絕]]，[[淈]][[殄沌]][[兮]]
#*:: '''''Loudly''' and boldly, a continuous stream of high and low notes become jumbled together.''
